# Chris Misztur

> Chris Misztur is the President & Founder of Mr. IIoT, specializing in building Smart Factories, both real and virtual. With two decades of experience, he integrates business systems into manufacturing processes, applying innovative technologies to drive digital transformation.

Based in the Greater Chicago Area, Chris has over 20 years of experience in Industrial IoT, Smart Factory implementation, Industry 4.0, and digital transformation for manufacturing. He is an expert in connecting disparate systems and identifying operational inefficiencies.
